alert.note: Alert for Coastal Ocean; Eastern Monmouth; Middlesex; Ocean; Western Monmouth (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued January 06 at 10:36PM EST until January 07 at 8:00AM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 8 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Middlesex, Western Monmouth, Eastern Monmouth, Ocean and Coastal Ocean. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 8 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...At this level, flooding begins on the most vulnerable roads in coastal and bayside communities, and along inland tidal waterways. Some partial or full road closures are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Flooding impacts will be greatest along the backbays of Barnegat Bay as water will be trapped within the bay. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Arthur Kill at Perth Amboy MLLW Categories - Minor 7.2 ft, Moderate 8.2 ft, Major 9.2 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.5 ft, Moderate 2.5 ft, Major 3.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- -------- 07/04 AM 7.5 1.8 2.6 Minor 07/04 PM 5.6 -0.1 1.7 None 08/05 AM 6.2 0.5 0.9 None 08/05 PM 5.4 -0.3 1.3 None 09/05 AM 6.5 0.8 1.0 None 09/06 PM 7.2 1.5 2.8 Minor Sandy Hook Bay at Sandy Hook MLLW Categories - Minor 6.7 ft, Moderate 7.7 ft, Major 8.7 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.5 ft, Moderate 2.5 ft, Major 3.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- -------- 07/04 AM 7.1 1.9 2.6 Minor 07/05 PM 5.5 0.3 2.0 None 08/05 AM 6.0 0.8 1.2 None 08/05 PM 5.1 -0.1 1.3 None 09/06 AM 6.2 1.0 1.0 None 09/07 PM 6.4 1.2 2.6 None Watson Creek at Manasquan MLLW Categories - Minor 5.7 ft, Moderate 6.7 ft, Major 7.7 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.3 ft, Moderate 2.3 ft, Major 3.3 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- -------- 07/03 AM 6.0 1.6 2.0 Minor 07/04 PM 4.8 0.4 1.5 None 08/05 AM 5.2 0.8 0.8 None 08/05 PM 4.3 -0.1 0.9 None 09/05 AM 5.2 0.8 0.6 None 09/06 PM 5.2 0.8 1.5 None Barnegat Bay at Barnegat Light MLLW Categories - Minor 3.5 ft, Moderate 4.5 ft, Major 5.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.0 ft, Moderate 2.0 ft, Major 3.0 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- -------- 07/03 AM 3.9 1.4 1.9 Minor 07/04 PM 3.2 0.7 1.7 None 08/05 AM 3.4 0.9 1.1 None 08/05 PM 2.8 0.3 1.2 None 09/05 AM 3.3 0.8 0.9 None 09/06 PM 3.1 0.6 1.4 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
